ContainerProps.name: rootProps
ContainerProps.description: Additional props for dropzone container element

ContentProps.name: isIconVisible
ContentProps.description: Force icon visibility NOTICE: passing true or false value explicitly will make component ignore resizing.

DropzoneContentProps.name: open
DropzoneContentProps.description: Open the native file selection dialog

DropzoneErrorBannerProps.name: fileRejections

DropzoneHookProps.name: maxFileNumber
DropzoneHookProps.description:
Maximum number files to the dropzone is allowed. All files above the limit
will be rejected.

DropzoneProps.name: dragError
DropzoneProps.description:
Error message if dragged files is rejected
<CodeBlock>
 {`{ type: DropErrorType, title: string, message: string }`}
</CodeBlock>

DropzoneProps.name: dropError
DropzoneProps.description:
Error message if dropped files is rejected
<CodeBlock>
 {`{ type: DropErrorType, title: string, message: string }`}
</CodeBlock>

DropzoneProps.name: isIconVisible
DropzoneProps.description:
NOTICE:
true - will make Icon always visible, despite the component height
false - will make Icon always hide, despite the component height
undefined - will look on the component height to decide show or hide Icon

DropzoneProps.name: multiple
DropzoneProps.description: Allow drag 'n' drop (or selection from the file dialog) of multiple files

DropzoneProps.name: contentRenderer
DropzoneProps.description: Render prop to specify a custom dropzone body message

DropzoneRef.name: open
DropzoneRef.description: Open the native file selection dialog
